= Introduction =

You can find answers for the most frequently asked questions here.

= Installation =

*I've installed the application but it gives an error: _"The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000135). Click on OK to terminate the application."_*

You should install *[http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyID=e5ad0459-cbcc-4b4f-97b6-fb17111cf544&displaylang=en Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Client Profile]* to run BlizzTV.

*I can't watch streams & video's using internal video player as it keeps crashing*

This is mostly caused by a problematic Flash installation on your system. Try uninstalling Flash Player from your system with Adobe Uninstaller and re-install it from http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/ using *Internet Explorer*.

= Streams Plugin =

*Can i watch xfire streams with BlizzTV?*

Yes you can. Xfire.com streams basically uses livestream, so use the actual livestream stream page name as the slug and select livestream from the provider's list on add new stream window.
